name: 50 Steps
description:
Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam.

Take control of a cube in a tile based world. Collect pickups and upgrades as you make your way forward. But be careful, for each step you take you will take damage! Use your actions carefully!

Game by:

Noah Vejvoda (Art, Sound, Programming) 

Kushal Trehan (Programming)

Carlos Alavez (Programming)
